content:
The checks "CI / build mathlib" and "CI / run tests" have failed frequently for me recently. Often I can't see particular error messages, or I'm unable to interpret them (most recently: No space left on device). And I don't see any corresponding issues locally.

Does someone understand what is going on?
It might be because some of the VMs didn't have enough RAM. They're being upgraded today.
I hope that is the issue, and that it will now be solved.

Thank you!

I just noticed that there was related discussion (pertaining to the same PR) here. And from it I understand that "I don't see any corresponding issues locally" was not strictly true: I have recently had to merge master very often to get a cache with which I don't have the orange bars. So I now think these are related, although I still don't really understand what's going on.

But thanks, great news about the upgrade!
